summary: Just some better coloring for Whiterun\'s buildings and architecture.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]EDIT:  Fix for the holey roofs!  Download after downloading the main file.[/b][/size]


[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/24354-1-1348099715.jpg[/img]

Greetings modders!  This retexture mod is the product of my desire to make Whiterun a bit warmer and sharper, without installing a lot of ENBs...so I went and sharped and recolored the existing textures.  I am so pleased with the final result, that I have decided to share them with you all.  Enjoy!

Please note, any other additions besides the textures, are not my own.  I used \"Beautiful Whiterun\" by MorninJerky for the added foliage and clutter.  So I really recommend that you download that one first!!  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12110]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12110[/url]

And if you really want a more foresty feel, you can also download \"Whiterun Trees\" by elderfan201 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8240]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8240[/url]

I\'ve used both in the past, and they don\'t clash with each other...at least not as far as I can tell.  

Also, another one that I see a lot of people use, that works even more perfectly, is this City Forests! [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9558]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9558[/url]  I just downloaded it and I am blown away by the result!  



If you like my texture edits, please let me know, and I\'ll see about editing some other towns or cities.  :D
author: Stephanie Young
